name: Easy Baked Chicken Wings
author: LYNN STEEVES
summary: Dip those wings in egg and flour, then pour a basic soy sauce, sugar and vinegar sauce over them and bake to completion. Good to take to a potluck dinner.
ingredients: ½ cup all-purpose flour for coating
directions: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Pour egg beat into a shallow dish or bowl; do the same with the flour
Heat oil and margarine in a large, deep skillet over medium high heat
Dip wings in egg, then flour, then fry until browned and crisp
Lay browned wings in an 11x14 inch baking dish
To Make Sauce: In a small bowl combine the soy sauce, water, sugar, vinegar and MSG
Blend well and pour sauce over chicken
Bake in the preheated oven for 1 hour
